input2: with a history of diabetes, hypertension, s/p gastric bypass in who presents with GI bleed. Pt recently started taking Fe supplements for anemia. Has noticed black stool over the last several days. Has felt very fatigued, SOB with exertion. No chest pain. Recent colonoscopy / EGD was unremarkable. No h/o GI bleed. No blood thinning medications. In ED, hct 32, Lactate 4, hematemeisis present when placing NGT.
